item.description:
By the Saturday after Thanksgiving, we will all hopefully have recovered from stuffing both the turkey and our faces and be ready to shift from traditional to more adventurous dining. And what could be more adventurous than checking out a new Boston restaurant? "Pairings," now open at the Park Plaza in the space formerly occupied by Bonfire, features "innovative small plates designed for sampling and sharing" as well as lots of wines by the glass. I think this calls for investigation, don't you?

As usual, your reservation fee is intended to show you are serious about coming and will be added to the tip for our table.
item.name: Post-Thanksgiving Dinner at Pairings, Boston
